info.title: Superplane Organizations API
info.description: API for managing organizations in the Superplane service

get.description: Returns a list of all blueprints
Returns a blueprint
Returns a list of all components
Returns a component by its name
Returns available actions for a component
Returns a list of groups within a domain

post.description: Creates a new group within a domain with a specific role

get.description: Returns details of a specific group within a domain

delete.description: Deletes an existing group within a domain

put.description: Updates an existing group within a domain

get.description: Returns users that belong to a specific group within a domain

post.description: Adds a user to a group within a domain

patch.description: Removes a user from a group within a domain

get.description: List integrations
Describe an integration
List integration resources
Returns the currently authenticated user

post.description: Regenerates the currently authencated user's API token

get.description: Returns the details of a specific organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

delete.description: Deletes the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns pending invitations for an organization

post.description: Invites a user to join an organization by email

delete.summary: Remove a user from an organization
delete.description: Removes a user from an organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns available roles for a specific domain type with their permissions and inheritance

post.description: Creates a new custom role with specified permissions

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific role including permissions and inheritance

put.description: Updates an existing custom role with new permissions

post.description: Assigns a role to a user within a domain

get.description: Returns the list of secrets
Returns the details of a specific secret
Returns a list of all available triggers
Returns a trigger by its name
Returns all users that have roles within a domain
Returns all permissions a user has within a specific domain
Returns the roles a user has within a specific domain
Returns a list of all workflows
Returns a workflow by ID
Returns a list of root events that triggered executions in a workflow
Returns a list of all node executions triggered by a root event

post.description: Invokes a custom action on a workflow node execution

post.summary: List child executions for an execution
post.description: List child executions for an execution

get.description: Returns a list of events for a specific workflow node

post.summary: Emit output event for workflow node
post.description: Emit output event for workflow node

get.description: Returns a list of executions for a specific workflow node

get.summary: List items in a node's queue
get.description: Returns a list of items in a node's queue

delete.summary: Delete item from a node's queue
delete.description: Deletes a specific item in a node's queue

placeholder.title: Optional placeholder text for UI inputs

SecretLocal.description: Local secrets are stored and managed by SuperPlane itself.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
